acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 50490.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Mecklenburg County was named, like Charlotte County, for Charlotte of Mecklenburg-Strelitz, consort of George III. It was formed from Lunenburg County in 1764.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Montgomery County (Va.) Chancery Cause: Ryan for etc vs. Ryan etc: commissioner's report division of slaves of William Ryan, 1841 Dec. 26, concerns the division of Ryan's slaves amongst his heirs. Slave names and valuations are listed as well as to whom assigned by the commissioners.
Originals refiled with suit papers in Montgomery County Chancery Cause 1841-013, Francis Ryan vs. White G. Ryan etc.
